wikipedia_page.main: Morgan Maddox Morgan-Owen DSO ((1877-02-20)20 February 1877 – 14 August 1950) was a Welsh amateur footballer who played in the Football League for Glossop and Nottingham Forest as a wing half. He won 12 caps and scored two goals for Wales between 1897 and 1907 and had a long career with each of the tour leading amateur clubs of the period, Corinthian and Casuals.
